title: Nobody Speaks Hawaiian in New Jersey
description: At times wickedly funny and satirical, at times touching and dramatic, "Nobody Speaks Hawaiian in New Jersey" brings together a luckless college president who dreams of building a monstrous new Climates and Environments Building on her ever-expanding campus; a disgruntled president of the United States who secretly hopes to lose his bid for re-election; and a destitute and barely-ambulatory 86-year-old resident of a New Jersey nursing home who is engaged in a life-and-death struggle. His mission: replenish his exhausted health benefits by qualifying for a government-funded job as a Hawaiian-speaking airline mechanic. Set in 2024 and employing humor to explore important themes, "Nobody Speaks Hawaiian in New Jersey" is an imaginative and suspenseful page-turner that continually surprises the reader.
author: Jerry DiCairano
